title: How to Clean Suede Furniture Without Ruining It
description:
In addition to shoes and clothing, suede can be used to upholster furniture—most commonly, couches, chairs, and ottomans. And like the apparel and accessories made from the fabric, suede furniture also tends to be pricey, tricky to clean, and easily ruined.

Read more...

title: Don't Make These Mistakes When Applying to Rent an Apartment
description:
The ongoing shortage of affordable housing has some people who planned on buying a home considering renting instead—at least temporarily. And while there are some real estate markets where buying is now actually cheaper than renting, the rest of the country is seeing high levels of competition for reasonably priced…

title: The Difference Between Soil and Dirt
description:
The meaning and usage of words often changes over time, but in some situations, words that are used interchangeably can have two (or more) distinctive meanings.
